about.title: Meet Our Team
about.missionDescription: We connect talented founders with the resources they need to build successful startups.
about.ourStoryDescription: We are a group of MIT alumni who are passionate about building successful startups and making innovation happen in LATAM. We are dedicated to helping founders build their niche and achieve their goals.

team.name: Juan Angel Luera
team.bio: MIT alumni with double major in Physics and EECS. Former Amazon engineer and startup co-founder with deep technical expertise in engineering and product development.

team.name: Sebastian Alberdi
team.bio: MIT alumni with double major in CS and Physics, currently pursuing Masters in CS. NVIDIA engineer with expertise in AI and high-performance computing.

team.name: Juan Antonio Luera
team.bio: MIT alumni with double major in Physics and EECS. Microsoft Software Engineer with startup experience and expertise in software development and engineering.

team.name: Cruz Soto
team.bio: MIT alumni with double major in Aero/Astro and Physics. Former SpaceX engineer and current PhD candidate in Aeronautics and Astronautics at Stanford with expertise in aerospace engineering and advanced propulsion systems.

advisors.name: Gyalpo Dongo
advisors.title: AI Entrepreneur & MIT Alumni
advisors.bio: MIT alumni with Master's degree in Computer Science, specializing in AI. Former founder of Xplain, an AI-powered educational platform in Latin America serving 50,000 students that raised $600k in funding. Part of Prod Cohort 2, an MIT-Harvard accelerator with 40 Billion AUM. Currently founder of a startup.

advisors.name: Abraham Cristiani
advisors.title: AI Forward Deployed Engineer + Entrepreneur & MIT Alumni
advisors.bio: MIT Alumni with a Master of Science in Management of Technology. Founder and former CTO of Relativity6, built mission-critical AI Workflows with 99.5% SLA compliance for Fortune 500 Companies.
